definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: A Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition is worth rescuing.
sentences.chinese: 一架状况尚好的兰开斯特轰炸机值得抢救。

sentences.english: In 1963 a Lancaster bomber crashed on Wallis Island.
sentences.chinese: 1963年，一架兰开斯特轰炸机在瓦立斯岛坠毁。

sentences.english: The Hersheys first lived in Lancaster.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次住在兰开斯特Hersheys。

sentences.english: Taking advantage of this the Lancaster family staged a comeback and Henry became a banner in recapturing the throne. By marriage with the daugh…
sentences.chinese: 兰开斯特家族乘势再起，亨利成为其重夺王位的旗帜。

definition: Wellington, capital of New Zealand (Tw)/Wellington (name)/Arthur Wellesley, Duke of Wellington (1769-1851)
